title: Historians on Era of Good Feelings

content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Using the accompanying excerpts, answer (a), (b), and (c). (a) Briefly describe ONE major difference between Waldstreicher’s and Unger’s historical interpretations of American nationalism. (b) Briefly explain how ONE specific historical event, development, or circumstance in the period 1800 to 1840 that is not explicitly mentioned in the excerpts could be used to support Waldstreicher’s argument. (c) Briefly explain how ONE specific historical event, development, or circumstance in the period 1800 to 1840 that is not explicitly mentioned in the excerpts could be used to support Unger’s argument.

frqParts.text: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
